page.title: 04INDUSTRY 2
page.content:
Vickers used to build all sorts of ships, like liners, oil-tankers and warships. They built the first British submarine. Now they build{nuclear- {powered submarines}for the Royal Navy. Vickers will build the new Trident submarines.
The other old industry, iron & steel making, closed down in 1983. The old {Steelworks are being pulled down now. Some people want to{save some of the {buildings.}They are not very nice, but they want to keep some of Barrow's history.
British Steel had been running the works down for some years, and people started looking for{other jobs}to do instead. That is why there are{new {factories}all along Park Road, through Ormsgill and Sowerby Wood.
